verses.verse: A Psalm of David. <S%H1732><s%> I will praise <S%H3034><s%> you with my whole <S%H3605><s%> heart: <S%H3820><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> the gods <S%H430><s%> will I sing <S%H2167><s%> praise <S%H2167><s%> to you.

I will worship <S%H7812><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> your holy <S%H6944><s%> temple, <S%H1964><s%> and praise <S%H3034><s%> your name <S%H8034><s%> for your loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> and for your truth: <S%H571><s%> for you have magnified <S%H1431><s%> your word <S%H565><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your name. <S%H8034><s%>
In the day <S%H3117><s%> when I cried <S%H7121><s%> you answered <S%H6030><s%> me, and strengthened <S%H7292><s%> me with strength <S%H5797><s%> in my soul. <S%H5315><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> shall praise <S%H3034><s%> you, O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> they hear <S%H8085><s%> the words <S%H561><s%> of your mouth. <S%H6310><s%>
Yes, they shall sing <S%H7891><s%> in the ways <S%H1870><s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> for great <S%H1419><s%> is the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Though <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> be high, <S%H7311><s%> yet has he respect <S%H7200><s%> to the lowly: <S%H8217><s%> but the proud <S%H1364><s%> he knows <S%H3045><s%> afar <S%H4801><s%> off.

Though <S%H518><s%> I walk <S%H3212><s%> in the middle <S%H7130><s%> of trouble, <S%H6869><s%> you will revive <S%H2421><s%> me: you shall stretch <S%H7971><s%> forth your hand <S%H3027><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the wrath <S%H639><s%> of my enemies, <S%H341><s%> and your right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> shall save <S%H3467><s%> me.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> will perfect <S%H1584><s%> that which concerns <S%H1157><s%> me: your mercy, <S%H2617><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> endures for ever: <S%H5769><s%> forsake <S%H7503><s%> not the works <S%H4639><s%> of your own hands. <S%H3027><s%>
